牽.definition: to lead along; to pull (an animal on a tether); (bound form) to involve; to draw in

牽一髮而動全身.pinyin: qiān yī fà ér dòng quán shēn
牽一髮而動全身.definition: lit. pulling a single hair makes the whole body move (idiom); fig. a small change in one part can affect the whole system

牽制.definition: to control; to curb; to restrict; to impede; to pin down (enemy troops)

牽動.definition: to affect; to produce a change in sth

牽引.definition: to pull; to draw (a cart); to tow

牽引車.definition: tractor unit; tractor truck; prime mover

牽強附會.definition: to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)

牽心掛腸.definition: to worry deeply about sth; extremely concerned

牽扯.definition: to involve; to implicate; to be interrelated

牽扯不清.definition: unclear; ambiguous; having an unclear relationship with

牽掛.definition: to worry about; to be concerned about

牽牛屬.definition: Pharbitis, genus of herbaceous plants including Morning glory 牽牛|牵牛 (Pharbitis nil)

牽牛星.definition: Altair (star); Cowherd of the folk tale Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女

牽累.definition: to weigh down; to trouble; to implicate (sb); tied down (by affairs)

牽絆.definition: to bind; to yoke; to impede

牽線.definition: to pull strings; to manipulate (a puppet); to control from behind the scene; to mediate

牽線人.definition: sb who pulls strings to get things done; wirepuller; go-between; matchmaker

牽羊擔酒.definition: pulling a lamb and bringing wine on a carrying pole (idiom); fig. to offer elaborate congratulations; to kill the fatted calf

牽聯.definition: variant of 牽連|牵连[qian1 lian2]

牽記.definition: to feel anxious about sth; unable to stop thinking about sth; to miss

牽連.definition: to implicate; implicated; to link together

牽頭.definition: to lead (an animal by the head); to take the lead; to coordinate (a combined operation); to mediate; a go-between (e.g. marriage broker)
